original_text: And you shall consume all the peoples that the Lord your God will give over to you. Your eye shall not pity them, neither shall you serve their gods, for that would be a snare to you.
korean_text: 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 넘겨주신 모든 민족을 네 눈이 긍휼히 여기지 말고 진멸하며 그들의 신을 섬기지 말라 그것이 네게 올무가 되리라

sentences.original_text: And you shall consume all the peoples
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 모든 민족을 소멸할 것이며

sentences.original_text: that the Lord your God will give over to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 넘겨주시는 것이라

sentences.original_text: Your eye shall not pity them,
neither shall you serve their gods,
for that would be a snare to you.
